entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
